data.actual_result: They change your cursor style and allow to move with the arrow keys, but not the mouse
data.expected_result: They respect their standard behavior, by allowing you the move and resizing the window
data.short_description: The "move" and "size" buttons from the right click context of the title bar do not work
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord not in fullscreen - Right click on the title bar - Click the "move" and "size" buttons
